AddGroupMember.document:
This API is used to add users to a group.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
AddGroupMember.name: Adds users to a group

BatchAddGroupMember.document:
This API is used to add users to multiple groups at a time.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
BatchAddGroupMember.name: Adds users to multiple groups

BatchCreateGroupWithMembers.document:
This API is used to create multiple groups at a time.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
BatchCreateGroupWithMembers.name: Creates multiple groups

BatchCreateRoom.document: This API is used to create multiple rooms at a time.
BatchCreateRoom.name: Creates multiple rooms

BatchDeleteGroupMember.document:
This API is used to remove users from multiple groups at a time.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
BatchDeleteGroupMember.name: Removes users from multiple groups

BatchDeleteRecord.document:
This API is used to delete the recordings of multiple rooms.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
BatchDeleteRecord.name: Deletes the recordings of multiple rooms

BatchDescribeDocument.document: This API is used to get courseware information.
BatchDescribeDocument.name: Gets courseware information

BatchRegister.document:
This API is used to register multiple users (up to 1,000) at a time. If a user ID already exists, the existing one will be overwritten.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
BatchRegister.name: Registers multiple users

BindDocumentToRoom.document: This API is used to bind a document to a room.
BindDocumentToRoom.name: Binds a document to a room.

CreateDocument.document: This API is used to create a document to be used in a room.
CreateDocument.name: Creates a document.

CreateGroupWithMembers.document:
his API is used to create a group and specify its members.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
CreateGroupWithMembers.name: Creates a group

CreateGroupWithSubGroup.document:
This API is used to merge groups.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
CreateGroupWithSubGroup.name: Merges groups

CreateRoom.document:
This API is used to create a room.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
CreateRoom.name: Creates a room.

CreateSupervisor.document: This API is used to create a spectator.
CreateSupervisor.name: Creates a spectator.

DeleteAppCustomContent.document: This API is used to delete the custom elements. The `Scenes` parameter specifies the custom elements to delete. If `Scenes` is empty, all custom elements will be deleted.
DeleteAppCustomContent.name: Deletes custom elements

DeleteDocument.document:
This API is used to delete a document.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
DeleteDocument.name: Deletes a document

DeleteGroup.document:
This API is used to delete one or multiple groups.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
DeleteGroup.name: Deletes groups

DeleteGroupMember.document:
This API is used to remove users from a group.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
DeleteGroupMember.name: Removes users from a group

DeleteRecord.document:
This example shows you how to delete the recording files of a specific room.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
DeleteRecord.name: Deletes the recording files of a specific room

DeleteRoom.document: This API is used to delete a room.
DeleteRoom.name: Deletes a room.

DeleteSupervisor.document: This API is used to delete spectators.
DeleteSupervisor.name: Deletes spectators

DescribeAnswerList.document: This API is used to get the answers to a quiz question in a room.
DescribeAnswerList.name: Gets the answers to a quiz question in a room

DescribeCurrentMemberList.document:
This API is used to get the user list of a room. This API will not work if a room has ended or expired.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
DescribeCurrentMemberList.name: Gets the user list of a room

DescribeDeveloper.document: This API is used to get developer information.
DescribeDeveloper.name: Gets developer information

DescribeDocument.document:
This API is used to get the information of a specific document.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
DescribeDocument.name: Gets the information of a document

DescribeDocuments.document:
有新接口替换

A new API is offered for this action now.

This API is used to query courseware. It has been deprecated. Please use `BatchDescribeDocument` instead.
DescribeDocuments.name: Queries courseware information

DescribeDocumentsByRoom.document:
This API is used to get the document list of a specific room.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
DescribeDocumentsByRoom.name: Gets the documents of a specific room

DescribeGroup.document:
This API is used to get the details of a group.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
DescribeGroup.name: Gets the details of a group

DescribeGroupList.document:
This API is used to query groups.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
DescribeGroupList.name: Queries groups

DescribeGroupMemberList.document:
This API is used to get the members of a group.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
DescribeGroupMemberList.name: Gets the members of a group

DescribeQuestionList.document: This API is used to get the quiz details of a room.
DescribeQuestionList.name: Gets the quiz details of a room

DescribeRoom.document:
This API is used to get room information.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
DescribeRoom.name: Gets room information.

DescribeRoomStatistics.document:
This API is used to obtain the statistics of a room. It can be called only after the room is ended.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
DescribeRoomStatistics.name: Obtains the statistics of a room.

DescribeSdkAppIdUsers.document:
This API is used to get the user list of a specific application.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
DescribeSdkAppIdUsers.name: Gets the user list of an application

DescribeSupervisors.document: This API is used to get the spectators of a room.
DescribeSupervisors.name: Gets the spectators of a room

DescribeUser.document: This API is used to obtain user profile.
DescribeUser.name: Obtains user profile.

EndRoom.document: This API is used to end a room.
EndRoom.name: Ends a room

GetRoomEvent.document: This API is used to get the events of a room. It only works within one hour after a class ends.
GetRoomEvent.name: Gets the events of a room

GetRoomMessage.document: This API is used to get the message history of a room (room messages are retained for seven days).
GetRoomMessage.name: Gets the message history of a room

GetRooms.document: This API is used to get the room list.
GetRooms.name: Gets the room list

GetWatermark.document:
This API is used to get watermark settings.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
GetWatermark.name: Gets watermark settings

KickUserFromRoom.document: This API is used to remove a user from the room.
KickUserFromRoom.name: Removes a user from the room

LoginOriginId.document: This API is used to log in with an origin account, which is the `originId` entered during registration.
LoginOriginId.name: Logs in with an origin account.

LoginUser.document: This API is used to log in.
LoginUser.name: Logs in.

ModifyApp.document:
This API is used to modify an application.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
ModifyApp.name: Modifies an application.

ModifyGroup.document:
This API is used to modify a group.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
ModifyGroup.name: Modifies a group

ModifyRoom.document:
This API is used to modify a room.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
ModifyRoom.name: Modifies a room

ModifyUserProfile.document:
This API is used to modify a user profile such as the nickname and profile photo.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
ModifyUserProfile.name: Modifies a user profile

RegisterUser.document: This API is used to register a user.
RegisterUser.name: Registers a user.

SetAppCustomContent.document: This API is used to set or update the custom content of an application, including the application icon and custom code. After you update JS and CSS content, you also need to call this API for the updates to take effect.
SetAppCustomContent.name: Sets the custom content of an application.

SetWatermark.document:
This API is used to configure watermarks.
A maximum of 20 requests can be initiated per second for this API.
SetWatermark.name: Configures watermarks

StartRoom.document: This API is used to start a room. Before you call this API, make sure a user has entered the room so that the class is initialized.
StartRoom.name: Starts a room

UnbindDocumentFromRoom.document: This API is used to unbind a document from a room.
UnbindDocumentFromRoom.name: Unbinds a document from a room.

members.document: The courseware access. [0]: The private courseware of the specified user (`Owner`) will be returned; [1]: The public courseware of the specified user will be returned; [0,1]: Both the private and public courseware of the specified user will be returned; [2]: The private courseware of the specified user and the public courseware of all users (including `Owner`) will be returned.

members.document: Transcoding type. Valid values: `0`: No transcoding required (default); `1`: Documents that need to be transcoded: ppt, pptx, pdf, doc, docx; `2`: Videos that need to be transcoded: mp4, 3pg, mpeg, avi, flv, wmv, rm, h264, etc.; `2`: Audio that needs to be transcoded: mp3, wav, wma, aac, flac, opus
members.name: TranscodeType

members.document: Permission. Valid values: `0`: Private document (default); `1`: Public document
members.name: Permission

members.document: Document extension
members.name: DocumentType

members.document: Document size, in bytes
members.name: DocumentSize

members.document: Whether or not to enable automatic processing for unsupported elements. Default: off. The automatically processed elements are as follows: 1. Ink: Remove unsupported ink (e.g. WPS Ink) 2. Auto Page Turn: Remove all auto page turn settings on the PPT and set it to mouse click to turn the page 3. Corrupted Audio/Video: Remove references to corrupted audio/video on the PPT
members.name: AutoHandleUnsupportedElement

members.name: Name

members.name: StartTime

members.document: Reserved room end time, in UNIX timestamp format

members.document: LCIC SdkAppId
members.name: SdkAppId

members.document: Resolution. Valid values: 1: SD; 2: HD; 3: FHD
members.name: Resolution

members.document: Maximum number of mic-on users (excluding teachers). Value range: [0, 16]
members.name: MaxMicNumber

members.document: The room subtype. Valid values: videodoc: Document + Video; video: Video only.
members.name: SubType

members.document: The user ID of the teacher. User IDs are returned by the user registration APIs. The user specified will have teacher permissions in the room created.
members.name: TeacherId

members.document: Whether to automatically turn the mic on when the user enters a room. Valid values: 0: No (default value); 1: Yes.
members.name: AutoMic

members.document: Whether to disconnect communication after audio/video permissions are revoked. Valid values: `0` (default): Yes; `1`: No.
members.name: TurnOffMic

members.document: Whether to enable the high audio quality mode. Valid values: 0: No (default value); 1: Yes.
members.name: AudioQuality

members.document: Whether to disable auto recording. Valid values: 0: No (default); 1: Yes. If this parameter is 0, recording will start when the class starts and stops when the class ends.
members.name: DisableRecord

members.document: The user IDs of the teaching assistants. User IDs are returned by the user registration APIs. The users specified will have teaching assistant permissions in the room created.
members.name: Assistants

members.document: The number of RTC users.
members.name: RTCAudienceNumber

members.document: The audience type.
members.name: AudienceType

members.document: Recording layout
members.name: RecordLayout

members.document: The ID of the group to bind. If you specify this parameter, only members of the group can enter this room.
members.name: GroupId

members.document:
Whether the teacher/teaching assistant can control students' cameras/microphones without the students' consent. Valid values: 
`0` (default): No (consent required)
`1`: Yes (no consent required)
members.name: EnableDirectControl

members.document: Turn on focus mode. 0 Watch all character audio and video (default) 1 Watch only teachers and assistants
members.name: InteractionMode

members.document: Horizontal and vertical screen. 0: Horizontal screen  (default); 1: Vertical screen , currently only support mobile video type
members.name: VideoOrientation

members.document: Enable after-class grading. 0: not on (default) 1: on
members.name: IsGradingRequiredPostClass

members.document: Room Type: 0 Small Classroom(default); 1 Lecture Hall(public class)
members.name: RoomType

members.document: Drag class time: unit: minutes. 0: no limit (default), -1: can't drag class, greater than 0: the time of dragging class. maximum value: 120 minutes.
members.name: EndDelayTime

members.document: Live type: 0 regular (default) 1 Simulated Live
members.name: LiveType

members.document: Simulated Live link
members.name: RecordLiveUrl

members.document: Whether to start the lesson automatically: 0 not automatic lesson (default) 1 automatic lesson live_type=1 is valid when
members.name: EnableAutoStart

members.document: Recorded file background image, support png, jpg, jpeg, bmp format, does not support transparent channel for the time being
members.name: RecordBackground

members.document: Record customized scene, only recordlayout=9 this parameter is valid, the data content for the user-defined scene parameters, data format for the json key-value pairs, where the key-value pairs of the value for the string type.
members.name: RecordScene

members.document: Record customized language, only when recordlayout=9, this parameter is valid.
members.name: RecordLang

members.document:
The event type. Valid values: 
`RoomStart`: The class started. `RoomEnd`: The class ended. `MemberJoin`: A user joined. `MemberQuit`: A user left. `RecordFinish`: Recording is finished.
·Camera0n·: The camera is turned on.
`Camera0ff`: The camera is turned off.
`MicOn`: The mic is turned on.
`MicOff`: The mic is turned off.
`ScreenOn`: Screen sharing is enabled.
`ScreenOff`: Screen sharing is disabled.
`VisibleOn`: The page is visible.
`VisibleOff`: The page is invisible.
members.name: EventType

members.document: Callback URL. Currently, only port 80 and port 443 are supported.
members.name: Callback

members.document: The callback key.
members.name: CallbackKey

members.document: Transfer Id
members.name: TransferId

members.document: Transfer Url
members.name: TransferUrl

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: The ID of the group to modify.
members.name: GroupId

members.document: The SDKAppID assigned by LCIC.
members.name: SdkAppId

members.document: The user ID of the teacher.
members.name: TeacherId

members.document: The new group name.
members.name: GroupName

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: The room ID.
members.name: RoomId

members.document: The SDKAppID assigned by LCIC.
members.name: SdkAppId

members.document: The room start time (Unix timestamp).
members.name: StartTime

members.document: The room end time (Unix timestamp).
members.name: EndTime

members.document: The user ID of the teacher. User IDs are returned by the user registration APIs.
members.name: TeacherId

members.document: The room name.
members.name: Name

members.document: The resolution. Valid values: 1: SD; 2: HD; 3: FHD.
members.name: Resolution

members.document: The maximum number of mic-on users (excluding the teacher). Value range: 0-16.
members.name: MaxMicNumber

members.document: Whether to automatically turn the mic on when a user enters the room. Valid values: 0: No (default value); 1: Yes.
members.name: AutoMic

members.document: Whether to enable the high audio quality mode. Valid values: 0: No (default value); 1: Yes.
members.name: AudioQuality

members.document: The room subtype. Valid values: videodoc: Document + Video; video: Video only; coteaching: Dual-teacher.
members.name: SubType

members.document: Whether to disable auto recording. Valid values: 0: No (default); 1: Yes. If this parameter is 0, recording will start when the class starts and stops when the class ends.
members.name: DisableRecord

members.document: The user IDs of the teacher assistants. User IDs are returned by the user registration APIs.
members.name: Assistants

members.document: The ID of the group to bind.
members.name: GroupId

members.document: Whether the students' consent is required to control their cameras/microphones.
members.name: EnableDirectControl

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: The ID of the user whose profile will be modified.
members.name: UserId

members.document: The new username to use.
members.name: Nickname

members.document: The URL of the new profile photo.
members.name: Avatar

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

QuestionInfo.document: A quiz question in a room.

members.document: The question ID.
members.name: QuestionId

members.document: The question.
members.name: QuestionContent

members.document: The time limit for the question. If you set this parameter to `0`, there will not be a time limit.
members.name: Duration

members.document: The correct answer. Bits are used to indicate the options that should be chosen. For example, `0x1` indicates option A; `0x11` indicates A and B, and so on.
members.name: CorrectAnswer

members.document:
The statistics for each type of answer.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: AnswerStats

members.document: LCIC SdkAppId
members.name: SdkAppId

members.document: Username
members.name: Name

members.document: User's ID in the customer system, which should be unique under the same application
members.name: OriginId

members.document: User's profile photo
members.name: Avatar

members.document: User ID
members.name: UserId

members.document: Login status token returned after successful login or registration. The token is valid for seven days.
members.name: Token

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

RoomInfo.document:
The information of the room to create.
Used by actions: BatchCreateRoom.

members.document: The room name.
members.name: Name

members.document: The room start time (Unix timestamp).
members.name: StartTime

members.document: The room end time (Unix timestamp).
members.name: EndTime

members.document: The resolution. Valid values: `1`: SD; `2`: HD; `3`: FHD.
members.name: Resolution

members.document: The maximum number of mic-on users (excluding the teacher). Value range: 0-16.
members.name: MaxMicNumber

members.document: The room subtype. Valid values: `videodoc`: Document + Video; `video`: Video only; `coteaching`: Dual-teacher.
members.name: SubType

members.document: The user ID of the teacher. User IDs are returned by the user registration APIs.
members.name: TeacherId

members.document: Whether to automatically turn the mic on when a user enters the room. Valid values: `0` (default): No; `1`: Yes.
members.name: AutoMic

members.document: Whether to disconnect communication after audio/video permissions are revoked. Valid values: `0` (default): Yes; `1`: No.
members.name: TurnOffMic

members.document: Whether to enable the high audio quality mode. Valid values: `0` (default): No; `1`: Yes.
members.name: AudioQuality

members.document: Whether to disable auto recording. Valid values: `0` (default): No; `1`: Yes. If this parameter is `0`, recording will start when the class starts and stops when the class ends.
members.name: DisableRecord

members.document: The user IDs of the teacher assistants. User IDs are returned by the user registration APIs.
members.name: Assistants

members.document: The number of RTC users.
members.name: RTCAudienceNumber

members.document: The audience type.
members.name: AudienceType

members.document: The recording layout.
members.name: RecordLayout

members.document: The ID of the group to bind. Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: GroupId

members.document: Whether the students' consent is required to control their cameras/microphones.
members.name: EnableDirectControl

members.document: Turn on focus mode. 0 Watch all character audio and video (default) 1 Watch only teachers and teaching assistants
members.name: InteractionMode

members.document: Horizontal and vertical screen. 0: Horizontal screen to open broadcast (default); 1: Vertical screen to open broadcast, currently only support mobile pure video type
members.name: VideoOrientation

members.document: Whether the room is enabled for grading after the lesson. 0: not enabled 1: enabled
members.name: IsGradingRequiredPostClass

members.document: Room Type: 0 Small Classroom(default); 1 Lecture Hall(public class)
members.name: RoomType

members.document: Drag class time: unit minutes, 0 is unlimited (default), -1 is can't drag the class, greater than 0 is the time of dragging the class, the maximum value of 120 minutes
members.name: EndDelayTime

members.document: Live type: 0 regular (default) 1 Simulated Live
members.name: LiveType

members.document: Simulated Live link
members.name: RecordLiveUrl

members.document: Whether to start the lesson automatically: 0 not automatic lesson (default) 1 automatic lesson live_type=1 is valid
members.name: EnableAutoStart

members.document: Recorded file background image, support png, jpg, jpeg, bmp format, does not support transparent channel for the time being
members.name: RecordBackground

members.document: Record customized scene, only recordlayout=9 this parameter is valid, the data content for the user-defined scene parameters, data format for the json key-value pairs, where the key-value pairs of the value for the string type.
members.name: RecordScene

members.document: Record customized language, only when recordlayout=9, this parameter is valid.
members.name: RecordLang

members.document:
The name.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: Name

members.document:
The room ID.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: RoomId

members.document:
The room status. `0`: Not started; `1`: Started; `2`: Ended.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: Status

members.document:
The scheduled start time.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: StartTime

members.document:
The scheduled end time.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: EndTime

members.document:
The actual start time.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: RealStartTime

members.document:
The actual end time.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: RealEndTime

members.document:
The resolution. `1`: SD.
`2`: HD
`3`: FHD
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: Resolution

members.document:
The maximum number of mic-on users allowed.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: MaxRTCMember

members.document:
The URL of the room's recording. This parameter has been deprecated. Please use `RecordUrl` instead.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: ReplayUrl

members.document:
The recording URL (HTTPS), which is generated only after a room ends.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: RecordUrl

members.document:
The maximum number of users allowed (including teachers) in the room. The default value is `0`, which indicates that no limit is set. 
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: MaxMicNumber

members.document:
Whether the students' consent is required to control their cameras/microphones.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid value was found.
members.name: EnableDirectControl

members.document: Room Type: 0 Small Classroom(default); 1 Lecture Hall(public class)
members.name: RoomType

members.document: Custom content
members.name: CustomContent

members.document: Application ID
members.name: SdkAppId

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: The SDKAppID assigned by LCIC.
members.name: SdkAppId

members.document: The URL of the watermark for the teacher’s video. If you pass in an empty string, the teacher’s video will not have a watermark.
members.name: TeacherUrl

members.document: The URL of the watermark for the whiteboard. If you pass in an empty string, the whiteboard video will not have a watermark.
members.name: BoardUrl

members.document: The image displayed when there is no video. If you pass in an empty string, no images will be displayed.
members.name: VideoUrl

members.document: The width of the whiteboard’s watermark, which is expressed as a percentage of the video width. The value range is 0-100, and the default value is 0.
members.name: BoardW

members.document: The height of the whiteboard’s watermark, which is expressed as a percentage of the video height. The value range is 0-100, and the default value is 0.
members.name: BoardH

members.document: The horizontal offset of the whiteboard’s watermark, which is expressed as a percentage of the video width. For example, 50 indicates that the watermark will appear in the middle horizontally. Value range: 0-100.
members.name: BoardX

members.document: The vertical offset of the whiteboard’s watermark, which is expressed as a percentage of the video width. For example, 50 indicates that the watermark will appear in the middle vertically. Value range: 0-100.
members.name: BoardY

members.document: The width of the watermark for the teacher’s video, which is expressed as a percentage of the video width. The value range is 0-100, and the default value is 0.
members.name: TeacherW

members.document: The height of the watermark for the teacher’s video, which is expressed as a percentage of the video height. The value range is 0-100, and the default value is 0.
members.name: TeacherH

members.document: The horizontal offset of the watermark for the teacher’s video, which is expressed as a percentage of the video width. For example, 50 indicates that the watermark will appear in the middle horizontally. Value range: 0-100.
members.name: TeacherX

members.document: The vertical offset of the watermark for the teacher’s video, which is expressed as a percentage of the video width. For example, 50 indicates that the watermark will appear in the middle vertically. Value range: 0-100.
members.name: TeacherY

members.document: The watermark text. If you pass in an empty string, there will be no text.
members.name: Text

members.document: The watermark text color.
members.name: TextColor

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: The room ID.
members.name: RoomId

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

The user information.

WatermarkConfig.document:
Watermark settings.
Used by actions: GetWatermark.

members.document: The URL of the watermark image. Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: Url

members.document: The watermark width, which is expressed as a percentage of the video width. Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: Width

members.document: The watermark height, which is expressed as a percentage of the video height. Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: Height

members.document: The horizontal offset of the watermark, which is expressed as a percentage of the video width. For example, 50 indicates that the watermark will appear in the middle horizontally. Value range: 0-100. Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: LocationX

members.document: The vertical offset of the watermark, which is expressed as a percentage of the video width. For example, 50 indicates that the watermark will appear in the middle vertically. Value range: 0-100. Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: LocationY
